1a3029bacb2f816a8f43b7d57b7d10d4 (07:29): oh btw, did you know that SCO owns the ELF executable file format?
a8ca23b1263a67497231334ce320bb64 (07:29): http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/binutils/binutils-2.16.1.tar.bz2 is the one I use. gcc 4.0.3 and gcc 4.1.0 breaks too old gcc and binutils.
a8ca23b1263a67497231334ce320bb64 (07:30): Lovely SCO commiting a death wish.  Thinking HP IBM and Sun all use ELF in there operating systems.

a8ca23b1263a67497231334ce320bb64 (07:51): 4.0.0 series is the start of the strict gccs that hate even minor errors. 4.1.0 get even more strict.
